import React from 'react' import NavComponent from '../navigation/NavComponent' import {Button, Card, Container, Form, FormControl, FormGroup, FormLabel} from "react-bootstrap"; function RegistrationComponent() { return ( <>

Let's Register For An Account

Username

(setUsername(e.target.value))} required />

Password

(setPassword(e.target.value))} required />

Email

(setEmail(e.target.value))} required />

role

(setRole(e.target.value))} required > {/* (setRole(e.target.value))}*/} {/*/>*/}
{error && (<>{

{message}

})}
) } export default RegistrationComponent
